title: Male Kpop Skins???
body: So we got K/DA why not a male group as well? So many male champs could work in this category,  {{champion:141}} ,{{champion:81}} , and {{champion:110}} are just some thoughts. Any suggestions?

replies.body: hmm Ez {{champion:81}}  is always picked for corny stuff so it makes since for him, maybe Raken {{champion:497}}  , Ekko  {{champion:245}} , and i agree with Taric {{champion:44}}

I really like this line-up, especially Ekko!! I think he would fit a male K/DA-like group really well.

I do struggle sometimes to think what outfits work for this thematic though. Female groups tend to lean heavily into thematics and can be a bit more costume-y. But boy groups really seem to stick to mostly street wear (thinking Ikon/BTS/EXO/etc.)? I think coming up with an iconic 'look' would be an interesting challenge

> 
> Call them "The Farm Boys"

Since the last 3 all have some kind of "running" theme with them, I'd recommend looping America's _A Horse with No Name_ while playing with those skins.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Tm4BrZjY_Sg

######It's not country, but hey.

If you're referring to like boy bands, yes, the style is all over the place and sometimes doesn't have a unifying theme. However, if you go into them with the same design goals as you did with KDA, it'd only be a matter of designing a male set of outfits that convey a togetherness while also giving them their own style. While not pop by any sense, KISS is a perfect example of an all male group that has a unifying theme that also has unique looks for each member.
To make a look for these guys, you'd have to pick something more sleek and fashionable, probably metrosexual for most. Take a look at these for inspiration:
https://5top10best.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/08/10.DBSK_-644x429.jpg
https://0.soompi.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/04092729/Cover-2-MYNAME-Royal-Pirates.jpg?s=900x600&e=t
https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTniP98c_84QlYQDpGAnFZaulFakdoUJzhJcS43CgwMWpAATSo7
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/7ai5xZlvq7o/hqdefault.jpg
https://www.billboard.com/files/styles/article_main_image/public/media/big-bang-mtv-europe-music-awards-billboard-650.jpg
Could definitely see Ezreal in the scarf.

Okay, stupid idea but hear me out.

{{champion:81}}-The 'Ahri' (Leading Singer and leader of the group)
{{champion:141}}-The 'Evelynn' (Secondary Singer and token 'bad boy')
{{champion:245}}-The 'Akali' (the rapper with the street or urban appeal)
{{champion:202}}-The 'Kai'sa' (the guy behind the group's choreography and theatrics and provides the chorus)

Said it before I'll say it again, we need a boy band group, sure kpop style would be cool or maybe like 90s boy band who knows point is guys need some loving. Also Battle of the Bands Crossover Event. Boy Band vs K/DA, Pentakill crashes it because that's how they do. Oh and I keep saying boy band but come on folks, we know they gotta be called _ACE._ ooh ooh no wait, there's 8 memebers, and they're called _8CE_ yeah... that's dumb enough that it'd be perfect.

My vote for male kPop would have to be:

{{champion:268}} (cause he can summon armies of bouncers to stop overly enthusiastic fans, and is a lead-singer sort of role)

{{champion:85}} (Have you SEEN that breakdancing?!?!)

and {{champion:497}} cause the guy loves to dance.

...

Fine. {{champion:81}} can come too, since he's always being fangirl'd over by the riot community. >.>
I just think he has too many skins already.
